channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Rich Text Publisher Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Rich Text Publisher Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34786|2024-08-03T09:22:10.690Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rich%20text%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Rich Text Publisher Plugin 1.4 and earlier does not escape the HTML message set by its post-build step, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.
